content: The <style=Highlight>flowers</style> on the ground, the <style=Highlight>broken seashells</style>, and the <style=Highlight>coral branches</style> on the beach would all make awesome decorations! I'll leave it to you! <style=SizeSmall>Just thinking about heading out's got my ears in a twist from the excitement!</style>
info: 关于车辆-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本II

content: {A抛扳手}I mean, before we actually set off, there's still one thing. I can handle all the fixing, but decorating... maybe you wanna choose the materials yourself?
info: 关于车辆-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本II

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, just in time! {A抛扳手}Ta-da! Yep, this ride's all yours! Now you can zoom ar — err, explore, anywhere you want!
info: 关于车辆-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本II

content: {A灵光一现}With a new ride, the universe is your oyster! You can cross the Starsea and even discover places no one's ever been to!
info: 关于车辆-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本II
